creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund and Gift of funds from Thirza Cleveland and Joan Wurtele
description: large black apron with loose flap beneath waistband; two embroidered bands at hem and lower corners; three horizontal embroidered bands on waistband; framed by smaller bands; flap has six vertical embroidered bands framed by smaller bands; back ties are made of red cloth with printed floral design
title: Baby Carrier
